snippet: Published with Jo Becker’s cover story this week on the “evolution” of President Obama’s view on gay marriage is a never-before-seen photograph of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. with Johnny and Josie Ward-Lombardo. When Biden was asked...
abstract: Published with Jo Becker’s cover story this week on the “evolution” of President Obama’s view on gay marriage is a never-before-seen photograph of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. with Johnny and Josie Ward-Lombardo. When Biden was asked about his personal views on same-sex marriage, he cited the children and gave an answer that went beyond the Obama administration’s official position.

headline.main: Jo Becker on the Moment that Mattered to the Vice President

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
